articles.title: Ukraine needs US security guarantee to deter Putin - PM - BBC.com
articles.description: The PM stresses the importance of US help but Trump suggests responsibility lies with Europe.
articles.content:
Chris MasonReporting from
Travelling with the prime minister
Alice ThompsonSenior political producer
Sir Keir Starmer has reiterated his call for a US security guarantee in Ukraine to deter Vladim… [+4855 chars]
